basics.name: Edoardo Lauria
basics.label: Postdoctoral Fellow at École Normale Supérieure & Mines Paris & INRIA
basics.summary: Theoretical physicist, with extensive international experience in academic research. Expertise in mathematical modeling, programming, and creative problem solving, supported by strong analytical, quantitative, and computational skills. Proven track record in scientific writing, public speaking, managing international collaborations, and leading multi-faceted scientific projects. Experienced in organizing academic events and securing research funding. Driven by creativity, teamwork, and a strong work ethic. Fluent in English and intermediate in French.
